alert.note: Alert for Riverside County Mountains; San Bernardino County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 22 at 2:16AM PST until December 23 at 4:00AM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST SATURDAY ABOVE 6500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow above 6500 feet, but with little if any accumulation below 7,500 feet. Additional snowfall up to 9 inches above 8,000 feet. * WHERE...San Bernardino County Mountains and Riverside County Mountains. * WHEN...Until 4 AM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult on the higher mountain highways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will be most intense this morning above 7,500 feet. The snow level will lower to 6,500 feet for this afternoon and evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For road condition information in California...enter 8 0 0 4 2 7 7 6 2 3 if inside california or 9 1 6 4 5 5 7 6 2 3 if outside California.

area.areaDesc: Riverside County Mountains; San Bernardino County Mountains
